name: Princess Salon-Top Fashion Show
description:
Cute little princess dress up game! Are you a fashionista that loves showing off your inner design talent? Come and check out this brand new dress up game! Now you can DRAG the outfits to any places you like to express your fashion talent.
Everyone deserves a new, fabulous look. What are you waiting for?
Clothes: Shirts, dress, Shoes ...
Scenery: Backgrounds
